title: Kled Lore: Could Kled have gotten some powers from Aatrox?
body:
I made another video on a channel I recently made: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uRVad15_O-w 
basically explaining all my thoughts on Kled but i'll summarize this Aatrox theory here. So if you want to look at some more reasoning/analysis go watch the video.

So we all know Kled is Noxian folk hero, but where did he get all of this power to earn every accolade possible, and never back down in a fight (and he's fought in every campaign since the founding of Noxus). Yes, obviously Riot is making it quite clear that he is a folk hero and these might be exaggerated, but its confirmed he was around when Sion was too because he quotes saying he "liked (Sion) better when (Sion) was alive". 

How does this get to Aatrox? Well after his confrontation with Aatrox Tryndamere mastered the barbaric ways and learned not to give up a fight just as much as Kled, even if it means death. Kled shows a lot of bloodlust through his sound barrier breaking screaming he does when he's fighting. When Aatrox showed up in the Protectorate vs Magelord war, he caused  "The warriors to find themselves imbued with a potent thirst for battle. They followed Aatrox into the fray, each fighting with the furious strength of ten until they had won a most unlikely victory.". 

Now we saw a scene of Kled fighting dozens of noxian soldiers, "with the furious strength of ten", in the reveal Riot put out. We also know that there are OLD tales in Noxian war poems Ezreal found that speak of a Darkin figure with a drawing of Aatrox. Kled is a very OLD yordle, said to have been around Noxus while it was being founded. He could have been around during the time that Aatrox made an appearance. 

Obviously it's not 100% true, but i think its still a possibility

replies.body: prob worth mentioning  Aatrox was the game designer's previous champ...   And I tend to troll my own previous work and the rest of the core DNAs (Design, Narrative, & Art) in VO.

That means it's not canon?
Can you give us some insight please about the relationship between the two if not?

The emotion of the line is always accurate. It always describes how they would feel if the met. And most of the champs selected to be taunted are lore "related" but a few are selected as easter eggs.   

If it seems really odd that a champ would know or have an interaction with a champ they have a taunt for... It's probably a joke about the metagame or a team-member who made it.   (Not always , we also hide some lore that players don't know yet.)

I.e Jhin's has lines about Zed and Shen.   Illaoi has lines about Gangplank and the bilgewater champs. Those are lore focused - though some haven't occured in the narrative yet.  
Illaoi's also has lines about Rek'Sai and Tahm Kench.  She mocks the "design" of Reksai (the game designer's previous champ) and Tahm's script ( ie myself).  Now  simultaneously it's possible that Illaoi could meet Rek'Sai in the future and quite possible she has encountered Tahm Kench in bilgewater-- and those lines accurately reflect how she would feel about them. Thus those lines weren't added to the VO script for lore reasons but are still true.

Make sense?

(Written on my fone plz ignore spelling and punctuation mistakes)

I just love how Riots finally communicate with players other than articles and PBE..
So did you just confirm that Aatrox's rework is coming in the very late future? XD
Jokes aside,how would Kled really feel if he met such powerful entices as Aatrox,Bard,Aurelion sol,Xerath,Tahm kench and Teemo(and more),would he still be such agressive and disrespectful? He plays with life and death with his tongue,but I'm specially intrested in Aatrox,since he's my fav champ,and what would Aatrox think about Kled and how will be respond to this mocking?
I'm not asking you to reveal any hidden info and stuff,but I would be VERY happy and satisfied if you answer my questions,since I consider myself to be one of the biggest lore fans and it would relieve my stress(I literally check the champion's visual,lore and champion interaction when they are revealed before anything else)
Thx

"How would Kled feel if he met Aatrox, Tahm etc.."   

Are they on his land?

In all seriousness the " what if" lines are accurate to his character.  Kled ain't afraid of nothing.
Not even some serious shit like Dark Star Thresh or Aurelion sol?
"Just kuz you made that star don't mean it aint mine"

"Are they on his land?"

Of course they are, everything is his land.
everyones on his land
tbh i hope aatrox rework comes soon and i would kill to see what aatrox would have to say

So while some VO lines won't reflect actual interactions, they do in a way represent how X champion could react if ever presented with Y, and are more opinionated than based on true lore. So when Kled's taunting Aatrox that's not saying he's ever met or even knows about Aatrox, but the VO gives an indication of how Kled might react to that champion, while also being a nice inside joke for you rioters. I suppose that's the kind of leniency you can get when the gameplay isn't canon, it's all a "what if", even down to the VO.

I imagine that it can get tricky to not go too overboard in making the taunts be too meta in that sense. I do remember you mentioning some Jhin taunts that got cut because you thought they were a bit too meta.
Yep thats it.

Cool, windows in to the psyche of characters is always interesting.

Btw you did a fantastic job on Kled. And Jhin. And Illaoi. Basically you write awesome stuff, so keep up the great work man!
Wait but Harrow - oh right Harrow was Aatrox's primary writer back then.

http://38.media.tumblr.com/105131c29e1d68ed769abfcfeebe9244/tumblr_ng4qsnVGb31tjydheo3_250.gif
I believe that I am the last remaining {{champion:266}} main on earth and possibly the universe {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

There's actually quite a few of us. He's one of my mains. If he was stronger in game he would totally be my _main_ main, but as it stands he's kinda weak. His design and backstory, quotes, etc. are why I really came to love him though.

Well, lets see some points that i gather while listening to the video:

- The theory about Du Couteau is wrong because Kled was figthing for Noxus even before Du Couteau were born. The Yordle is older than Noxus itself.
- The Theory of Aatrox may be wrong as well for many reasons: First of all, Kled is a Yordle and yordles are "enemies" of Tahm Kench... and The Catfish demon is friend of Aatrox, so, i highly doubt that Kled would care about Aatrox at all... In fact, the other reason of why i doubt of this theory is because of this: 

https://youtu.be/39bgavG3OGA?t=17 https://youtu.be/39bgavG3OGA?t=78

Kled knows Aatrox (because Kled has been participating in every Noxian war), but he do not respect Aatrox.

- I think that you are right about the yordles

Tryndamere and Aatrox are rivals, Aatrox and Kled don't need to be friends in order for a conflict to happen between them. Aatrox doesn't seem to care whether or not people care or like him, he appears when he wants.

At your first point I can't believe I would overlook that, but we don't know Du Couteau age. Not only that, we don't know if Du Couteau rised in ranks before Kled, he is a noble and Kled started as an immigrant. It would be easier for him.

> [{quoted}](name=YouCantClickThis,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=BZwnm9L8,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-07-29T19:45:18.798+0000)
>
> Tryndamere and Aatrox are rivals, Aatrox and Kled don't need to be friends in order for a conflict to happen between them. Aatrox doesn't seem to care whether or not people care or like him, he appears when he wants.

I highly doubt that a timeless magical creature as Kled would need to get power from Aatrox, more considering that he values the Noxian "code" of Strenght (Personal strenght, not a strenght borrowed by others). Also, as i mentioned before, Aatrox is friend of Tahmn Kench... and it would be a really bad move to give more power to an enemy of his friend. 

> 
> At your first point I can't believe I would overlook that, but we don't know Du Couteau age. Not only that, we don't know if Du Couteau rised in ranks before Kled, he is a noble and Kled started as an immigrant. It would be easier for him.

Well, we know that only the Darkwill familly practiced necromancy to expand their livespawns, so, its safe to assume than Du Coteau has the livespawn of a normal human... and due that, Kled rised in ranks before him. The yordle has been in Noxus since the beginning... so, he isnt an immigrant.

Friends? I feel like it's just a mutual respect between the two, because they both force people into situations they so desire. Both are demons of some sort. Like I said before, it's not a matter of Kled asking Aatrox, or "borrowing" power, Aatrox doesn't give people much of a choice. There's no official mention of them working together anyway. Power isn't something that I really see associated with Tahm, that's not really his concern. He wants to feed his appetite, and whether or not Aatrox would give a yordle power I don't think he would find too much of an issue with that. I think a confrontation between the two(Kled and Aatrox) has definitely happened which is why Riot decided to give Kled an interaction with Aatrox in the first place. 

Why would Noxians be targeting him then? They were literally sending back-up troops to attack him at the last scene in the freeze frame. We'll see when the lore drops but why would they not mention Kled as a general or leader of Noxus by now if he earned every accolade, and risen in ranks before most generals being that he was there since the beginning? There was clearly an issue between him and the political side of Noxus. Nobles didn't like him, and some officers distrusted him so it gives some reason for a noble to come in later and rise in ranks a lot quicker then he did.

> [{quoted}](name=YouCantClickThis,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=BZwnm9L8,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-29T20:41:37.900+0000)
>
> Friends? I feel like it's just a mutual respect between the two, because they both force people into situations they so desire. Both are demons of some sort. 

The official page actually list them as Friends, Aatrox is not an acual demon and Kled knows that. 

>Like I said before, it's not a matter of Kled asking Aatrox, or "borrowing" power, Aatrox doesn't give people much of a choice. There's no official mention of them working together anyway. Power isn't something that I really see associated with Tahm, that's not really his concern. He wants to feed his appetite, and whether or not Aatrox would give a yordle power I don't think he would find too much of an issue with that. 

Im pretty sure that Tahm would have problems with it after hearing that Kled dislikes Tahm and calls him a liar.

> I think a confrontation between the two(Kled and Aatrox) has definitely happened which is why Riot decided to give Kled an interaction with Aatrox in the first place. 

I agree that there were many confrontations between Kled and Aatrox, after all, both of them have participated in many wars and have been in the same battlefield. However, i dont agree with the part of your theory that says that Aatrox have him power, because Yordles already have magical power and "inmortality" due being Timeless creatures. 
 
> Why would Noxians be targeting him then? They were literally sending back-up troops to attack him at the last scene in the freeze frame. We'll see when the lore drops but why would they not mention Kled as a general or leader of Noxus by now if he earned every accolade, and risen in ranks before most generals being that he was there since the beginning? There was clearly an issue between him and the political side of Noxus. Nobles didn't like him, and some officers distrusted him so it gives some reason for a noble to come in later and rise in ranks a lot quicker then he did.

Kled deffends Noxus and the ideals of the Noxian people, however as you can hear in the interactions that he has, it seems that he dislikes the current state of Noxus and agrees more on the Noxian Ideals that Riven has.

However, its not impossible that your theory about Du Coteau its not Far fetched and you are right about him receiving "help" of a member of the Du Coteau Familly... maybe the great grandfather of Marcus Du Couteau or something like that. This could be supported by the old JoJ, because a member of the Du Coteau Familly (Katarina) agrees with Noxus having yordles in their army.

> [{quoted}](name=Ebonmaw Dragon,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=BZwnm9L8,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-29T21:13:38.162+0000)
>
> The official page actually list them as Friends, Aatrox is not an acual demon and Kled knows that. 
> 
> Im pretty sure that Tahm would have problems with it after hearing that Kled dislikes Tahm and calls him a liar.
> 

I know Aatrox is not an actual demon, I just said he shares characteristics of a demon. 

Tahm's lore literally has less than 100 words, I just don't think you can assume such a heavy connection between them if he wasn't even mentioned in his lore. Aatrox waged wars on his own, I don't think he would care if a catfish had a problem with it. I think you're taking the category "Friend" too literally. Ziggs is friends with Rumble and heimer, while Rumble has heimer listed as a Rival and Ziggs as friend.

Also he is rivals with every single champion in the game. because anybody that trespasses on his land is considered an enemy to him, and also he only wants skaarl as his true friend and the only friend he could ever have or trust.
He may not know who aatrox is even. he is just saying how stupid and dumb he thinks it is to drink blood from battle. Other then that i dont think he knows anything about him.

Very disrespectful toward Aatrox,however just because Kled is so old is already suspicious,there is no way a yordle could have such a lifespan and I'm pretty sure Riot never said they are timeless or immortal
Riot also never said they aren't timeless or immortal. A lot of yordles already have been proven to live a very long time, see Poppy. Don't see the disrespect either.

the lifespan of a creature doesn't always decide wether it's immortal or not.
Heck maybe even the filthy void creatures are immortal
lulu is over 1000 years old. she was in a forest that slowed her time down i just wanted to say that. and yes her time but shes still over 1000 years old
Kled gets his "power" from straight up paranoia and bring intensely territorial.
I used "some" for that reason. I know he was a capable fighter before that.
